title: Norwegian architecture and applied arts
creator_credit: Informasjonsfilm and Japan. Ministry of Foreign Affairs
brief_description: Examines the origins of modern Norwegian architecture in the home crafts of rural Norway. Scenes depict craftsmen at work wood carving, glass blowing, pottery making, weaving and making jewellery and enamel ware.
